title: Mastering JavaScript for Web Development
author: John Doe
details: This article covers essential JavaScript concepts for modern web development. Perfect for beginners and intermediate developers looking to enhance their frontend skills.

title: Python Basics: A Beginner's Guide
author: Sarah Ahmed
details: Learn the foundational concepts of Python including variables, data types, and syntax. A must-read for anyone starting their coding journey.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
author: Ali Khan
details: A beginner-friendly overview of machine learning concepts, including supervised and unsupervised learning, and how to get started with Python libraries.

title: Building Responsive Websites with HTML & CSS
author: Maya Rahman
details: Discover the best practices for creating responsive and visually appealing websites using HTML and CSS. Includes practical examples and design tips.

title: Version Control with Git and GitHub
author: Tariq Islam
details: Understand the basics of version control using Git and how to collaborate on projects through GitHub. Ideal for developers and students alike.

title: Backend Development with Node.js
author: Fatima Noor
details: Explore backend development using Node.js. Learn how to build scalable APIs and web servers with Express and integrate them into your applications.
